DOC.brief_title: Investigation Radiofrequency Device Treatment Wrinkles Rhytides
DOC.criteria: Male female least 21 year old , Apparently healthy , Informed consent sign subject . Tobacco smoker , History skin hypersensitivity , Current skin disorder infection ( e.g. , herpes simplex ) , Prior cosmetic treatment face ( e.g . Botox ) facial filler ( e.g . Restylane ) , Subjects pacemaker , internal defibrillator electronically , magnetically , mechanically activated implant , Subjects implant medical prosthesis ( clip , pin plate ) proximal treatment site , The current recent use ( within past 12 month ) isotretinoin , Pregnancy breast feeding , Insulin dependent diabetic subject , Oxygen dependent subject , Subjects severe chronic illness , scleroderma , lupus , Subjects open sore scar treatment region , Subjects ischemia treatment region .
